about.title: About me
about.p1: Hi, my name is Juan Pablo. My interest on coding dates from when I was 15 years old when I did it as a hobbie. That, combined with my desire to understand how devices around us work, led me to pursue a bachelor in electronic engineering. Once I finished, I decided to specialize in backend development
about.p2: I'm currently working as a assistant professor in the Universidad Nacional de San Luis on subjects that combine my interest in sharing knowledge with my passion for programming, encouragiing me to improve continuously.
about.p3: I have taken part in innovative competitions and projects that have allowed me to apply my knowledge in solving real problems.I have experience in the development of web and mobile aplications for different purposes, always focusing on obtaning an optimal performance.
